original.input: Find the weather in Paris and convert 25C to Fahrenheit

<|start|>developer<|message|># Tools

## functions

namespace functions {

// Get weather for location
type get_weather = (_: {
location: string,
}) => any;

// Convert temperature between units
type convert_temperature = (_: {
value: number,
from_unit: "celsius" | "fahrenheit",
to_unit: "celsius" | "fahrenheit",
}) => any;

} // namespace functions<|end|>
<|start|>user<|message|>Find the weather in Paris and convert 25C to Fahrenheit<|end|>
